title: The Impacts of the Summer Drought on our Farm!

tasks.task: Checking on goats during hot weather.
subtasks: Walking towards the buck pan.
Observing the weight and milk condition of Goats.
Considering breeding for future litters.
Evaluating individual goat's health and reproductive potential.
Noting the stinky behavior of Fluffinutter during rutting season.
Addressing the impact of massive parasite loads during spring and summer.

tasks.task: Maintaining quail health and egg production.
subtasks: Supplementing quail diet with mealworms and high protein feed.
Checking on quail molting and egg laying.
Evaluating the impact of goats on permaculture beds.
Re-evaluating protection methods for strawberry and comfrey.

tasks.task: Dealing with drought effects on the garden.
subtasks: Assessing the impact of drought on tomato plants.
Reports on the survival of other garden plants like peppers, pepino melons, and horseradish.
Planning to sow crops like carrots and beets when the temperatures cool.
Reflecting on unfavourable conditions for typical fall planting times.
